azureApiVersion.desc: Azure API version, follow the format YYYY-MM-DD, check the [latest version](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/ai-services/openai/reference#chat-completions)
azureApiVersion.title: Azure API Version

azure.empty: Please enter a model ID to add the first model

endpoint.desc: When checking resources from the Azure portal, you can find this value in the 'Keys and Endpoints' section
endpoint.title: Azure API Address

azure.modelListPlaceholder: Select or add the OpenAI model you deployed
azure.title: Azure OpenAI

token.desc: When checking resources from the Azure portal, you can find this value in the 'Keys and Endpoints' section. You can use KEY1 or KEY2
token.title: API Key

azureApiVersion.desc: The API version for Azure, following the YYYY-MM-DD format. Refer to the [latest version](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/ai-services/openai/reference#chat-completions)
azureApiVersion.title: Azure API Version

endpoint.desc: Find the Azure AI model inference endpoint from the Azure AI project overview
endpoint.title: Azure AI Endpoint

token.desc: Find the API key from the Azure AI project overview
token.title: Key

checker.desc: Test if AccessKeyId / SecretAccessKey are filled in correctly

sessionToken.desc: If you are using AWS SSO/STS, please enter your AWS Session Token
sessionToken.title: AWS Session Token (optional)

unlock.description: Enter your AWS AccessKeyId / SecretAccessKey to start the session. The app will not store your authentication configuration
unlock.imageGenerationDescription: Enter your AWS AccessKeyId / SecretAccessKey to start generating. The application will not store your authentication credentials.
unlock.title: Use Custom Bedrock Authentication Information

baseURLOrAccountID.desc: Enter your Cloudflare account ID or custom API address
baseURLOrAccountID.placeholder: Cloudflare Account ID / custom API URL
baseURLOrAccountID.title: Cloudflare Account ID / API Address

apiKey.desc: API key for Bearer Token authentication
apiKey.title: API Key

authType.desc: Select the authentication method for connecting to the ComfyUI server
authType.title: Authentication Type

baseURL.desc: ComfyUI server access address, e.g., http://localhost:8000
baseURL.required: Please enter the ComfyUI service URL
baseURL.title: ComfyUI Service URL

checker.desc: Test if the connection is properly configured
checker.title: Connectivity Check

customHeaders.desc: Request headers required for custom authentication, formatted as key-value pairs
customHeaders.title: Custom Headers

id.desc: Unique identifier for the service provider, which cannot be modified after creation
id.format: Can only contain numbers, lowercase letters, hyphens (-), and underscores (_)
id.placeholder: Suggested all lowercase, e.g., openai, cannot be modified after creation
id.title: Provider ID

logo.required: Please upload a valid provider logo
logo.title: Provider Logo

name.placeholder: Please enter the display name of the provider
name.title: Provider Name

personalAccessToken.desc: Enter your GitHub PAT. Click [here](https://github.com/settings/tokens) to create one.
personalAccessToken.title: GitHub PAT

accessToken.desc: Enter your HuggingFace Token, click [here](https://huggingface.co/settings/tokens) to create one
accessToken.title: HuggingFace Token

apiKey.desc: API key provided by the New API platform
apiKey.title: API Key

apiUrl.desc: API endpoint for the New API service, usually includes /v1
apiUrl.title: API URL

checker.desc: Test if the proxy address is correctly filled in
checker.title: Connectivity Check

customModelName.desc: Add custom models, separate multiple models with commas
customModelName.title: Custom model name

download.desc: Ollama is downloading the model. Please try not to close this page. The download will resume from where it left off if interrupted.
download.failed: Model download failed. Please check your network or Ollama settings and try again.
download.title: Downloading model {{model}}

endpoint.desc: Must include http(s)://; can be left blank if not specified locally.
endpoint.title: Interface proxy address

unlock.description: Enter your Ollama model tag to continue the session
unlock.title: Download specified Ollama model

config.aesGcm: Your key and proxy URL will be encrypted using <1>AES-GCM</1> encryption algorithm

apiKey.descWithUrl: Please enter your {{name}} API Key. <3>Click here to get it</3>
apiKey.title: API Key

checker.desc: Test if the API Key and proxy URL are correctly filled
checker.title: Connectivity Check

fetchOnClient.desc: Client request mode will initiate session requests directly from the browser, which can improve response speed
fetchOnClient.title: Use Client Request Mode

responsesApi.desc: Utilizes OpenAI's next-generation request format specification to unlock advanced features like chain of thought
responsesApi.title: Use Responses API Specification

config.waitingForMore: More models are currently <1>planned for integration</1>, please stay tuned

customModelCards.confirmDelete: You are about to delete this custom model. Once deleted, it cannot be recovered. Please proceed with caution.

delete.confirm: Are you sure you want to delete model {{displayName}}?
delete.title: Delete Model

azureDeployName.extra: Field used for actual requests in Azure OpenAI
azureDeployName.placeholder: Please enter the model deployment name in Azure
azureDeployName.title: Model Deployment Name

deployName.extra: This field will be used as the model ID when sending requests
deployName.placeholder: Please enter the actual deployment name or ID of the model
deployName.title: Model Deployment Name

displayName.placeholder: Please enter the display name of the model, e.g., ChatGPT, GPT-4, etc.
displayName.title: Model Display Name

files.extra: The current file upload implementation is just a hack solution, limited to self-experimentation. Please wait for complete file upload capabilities in future implementations.
files.title: File Upload Support

functionCall.extra: This configuration will only enable the model's ability to use tools, allowing for the addition of tool-type plugins. However, whether the model can truly use the tools depends entirely on the model itself; please test for usability on your own.
functionCall.title: Support for Tool Usage

id.extra: This cannot be modified after creation and will be used as the model ID when calling AI
id.placeholder: Please enter the model ID, e.g., gpt-4o or claude-3.5-sonnet
id.title: Model ID

imageOutput.extra: This setting enables the model's image generation capability only. The actual performance depends entirely on the model itself. Please test the model to determine if it supports image generation.
imageOutput.title: Supports Image Generation

reasoning.extra: This configuration will enable the model's deep thinking capabilities, and the specific effects depend entirely on the model itself. Please test whether this model has usable deep thinking abilities.
reasoning.title: Support Deep Thinking

search.extra: This setting enables the model's built-in web search capability. Whether the built-in search engine is supported depends on the model itself. Please test the model to verify the availability of this feature.
search.title: Supports Web Search

tokens.extra: Set the maximum number of tokens supported by the model
tokens.title: Maximum Context Window

type.extra: Different model types have distinct use cases and capabilities
type.title: Model Type

video.extra: This setting enables video recognition configuration within the application. Whether video recognition is supported depends entirely on the model itself. Please test the model to verify the availability of this feature.
video.title: Supports Video Recognition

vision.extra: This configuration will only enable image upload capabilities in the application. Whether recognition is supported depends entirely on the model itself. Please test the visual recognition capabilities of the model yourself.
vision.title: Support Vision

empty.desc: Please create a custom model or pull a model to get started.
empty.title: No available models

list.enabledEmpty: No enabled models available. Please enable your preferred models from the list below~
list.noModelsInCategory: No enabled models in this category

resetAll.conform: Are you sure you want to reset all modifications to the current model? After resetting, the current model list will return to its default state.
resetAll.title: Reset All Modifications

list.title: Model List

updateAiProvider.confirmDelete: You are about to delete this AI provider. Once deleted, it cannot be retrieved. Are you sure you want to delete?

region.desc: Select the region for Vertex AI service. Some models like Gemini 2.5 are only available in specific regions (e.g., global)
region.title: Vertex AI Region
